TopicTitle: How do I get eve on map

Articles.Content: I am flying through space and I cant find eve, I looked in the orbit thingy and I only see the mun, how do I get everything else?
You'll want to either change the target object (tab key), or scroll the view in/out (mouse wheel)
Also if you're playing the demo, you won't get Eve, just Kerbin and Mun
you might also just have to zoom out more
It's one of those two things: zoom out more if you've got the full game. If you're just playing the demo, the only possible target is the Mun.
